data.narrative: At 01:30 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava walks into the kitchen. Sunlight, diffused by the cloudy sky outside, streams through the window above the sink. The stainless steel appliances gleam softly in the muted light. She spots a **refrigerator (refrigerator_kitchen_01)** to her left and a **stove (stove_kitchen_01)** to her right. A **countertop (countertop_kitchen_01)** runs along the wall, offering ample space for meal preparation.

data.narrative: At 01:30 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava pulls open the refrigerator door. The cool air rushes out, carrying the faint scent of leftover takeout and fresh produce. Inside, she sees a carton of **eggs (eggs_01)** on the top shelf, a half-empty container of **yogurt (yogurt_01)**, and various **vegetables (vegetables_01)** in the crisper drawer. A bottle of **sparkling water (sparkling_water_01)** sits on the door.

data.narrative: At 01:30 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava peers into the refrigerator, its interior illuminated by the cool, white light. On the top shelf, behind the **carton of eggs (eggs_01)**, she notices a plastic container holding leftover **chicken tikka masala (tikka_masala_01)** from last night's takeout – perfect. Below, on the door, various condiments are neatly arranged: **mustard (mustard_01)**, **mayonnaise (mayonnaise_01)**, and a jar of **pickles (pickles_01)**. The crisper drawers are filled with slightly wilted **spinach (spinach_01)** and a lonely **tomato (tomato_01)**.
